doc.after: In Shanghai Wei Junluo found work at a photo studio owned by He Zuomin a photographer for the Mingxing Film Company 4 Influenced by the studio s many customers from the film industry she became fascinated with acting 3 In 1940 she enrolled in a drama school and was employed by the Xinhua Film Company after graduation She adopted the name Shangguan Yunzhu suggested by the influential director Bu Wancang 2 After successfully playing the female lead in Cao Yu s stage play Thunderstorm Shangguan joined the Yihua Company and made her film debut in Fallen Rose in 1941 2
